name: Cats Hidden in Bali
description:
Cats Hidden in Bali is a cute hidden object game set in Bali.

100 cats are waiting for you to be discovered within a hand-drawn background.
Relax thanks to the chill soundtrack

Found a cat? Click on it!

Features

🐾 1 Level, 100 cats

❔ Easter Eggs
💡 Hint System
⏰ Timer mode with leaderboard
⚙️ Settings


https://store.steampowered.com/app/2485180/Cats_Hidden_in_Georgia/ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2377970/Cats_Hidden_Around_the_World/
